languages.text: {n}При виде Кассии лицо губернатора вытягивается.{/n} "Леди-Навигатор? Какая честь! Не ожидал, что Дом Орселлио однажды посетит наш мир. Хотел бы я принять вас при иных обстоятельствах".

{n}The governor's expression changes drastically when he sees Cassia.{/n} "Lady Navigator? What an honour! I never thought that House Orsellio would grace our world with a visit. I only wish I could have received you under different circumstances."
languages.original_text: {n}При виде Кассии лицо губернатора вытягивается.{/n} "Леди-Навигатор? Какая честь! Не ожидал, что Дом Орселлио однажды посетит наш мир. Хотел бы я принять вас при иных обстоятельствах".

languages.text: {n}Der Ausdruck des Gouverneurs verändert sich drastisch, als er Cassia erblickt.{/n} "Lady Navigator? Was für eine Ehre! Ich hätte nie gedacht, dass das Haus Orsellio unsere Welt mit einem Besuch beehrt. Ich hätte Euch nur gerne unter anderen Umständen empfangen."
languages.original_text: {n}The governor's expression changes drastically when he sees Cassia.{/n} "Lady Navigator? What an honour! I never thought that House Orsellio would grace our world with a visit. I only wish I could have received you under different circumstances."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Ausdruck des Gouverneurs verändert sich drastisch, als er Cassia erblickt.{/n} "Lady Navigator? Was für eine Ehre! Ich hätte nie gedacht, dass das Haus Orsellio unsere Welt mit einem Besuch beehrt. Ich hätte Euch gerne unter anderen Umständen empfangen."

languages.text: {n}Le visage du gouverneur change radicalement d'expression lorsqu'il voit Cassia.{/n} « Dame navigatrice ? Quel honneur ! Je n'aurais jamais cru que notre monde recevrait un jour la visite d'un membre de la maison Orsellio. J'aurais préféré vous recevoir dans de meilleures circonstances. »
languages.original_text: {n}The governor's expression changes drastically when he sees Cassia.{/n} "Lady Navigator? What an honour! I never thought that House Orsellio would grace our world with a visit. I only wish I could have received you under different circumstances."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le visage du gouverneur change radicalement d'expression lorsqu'il voit Cassia.{/n} « Dame navigatrice ? Quel honneur ! Je n'aurais jamais cru que notre monde recevrait un jour la visite d'un membre de la maison Orsellio. J'aurais préféré vous recevoir dans de meilleures circonstances. »

languages.text: {n}总督看到卡西娅时，脸色变得诚惶诚恐。{/n}“导航者女士？真是荣幸之至！我从未想过，奥赛罗家族竟会屈尊造访我们的世界。若是能在其他情况下接待您就好了。”
languages.original_text: {n}The governor's expression changes drastically when he sees Cassia.{/n} "Lady Navigator? What an honour! I never thought that House Orsellio would grace our world with a visit. I only wish I could have received you under different circumstances."

traits.locale_text: {n}总督看到卡西娅时脸色大变。{/n}“导航者女士？真是荣幸之至！我从未想过，奥塞罗家族竟会屈尊造访我们的世界。若是能在别的情况下接待您就好了。”

languages.text: {n}カシアを見て、総督の表情は急激に変化する。{/n}「航宙士様？なんと光栄な！オーセリオ家がご来訪の名誉にあずかるなど、思ってもおりませんでした。ただ、もっと違う状況でお迎えできたらよかったのですが」
languages.original_text: {n}The governor's expression changes drastically when he sees Cassia.{/n} "Lady Navigator? What an honour! I never thought that House Orsellio would grace our world with a visit. I only wish I could have received you under different circumstances."

traits.locale_text: {n}カシアを見て、総督の表情は急激に変化する。{/n}「航宙士様？なんと光栄な！オーセリオ家がご来訪の名誉にあずかるなど、思ってもおりませんでした。もっと違う状況でお迎えできたらよかったのですが」

languages.text: {n}La expresión del gobernante cambia drásticamente cuando ve a Cassia.{/n} «¿Lady Navegante? ¡Qué honor! Nunca pensé que la casa Orsellio visitaría nuestro mundo. Solo desearía poder recibirla en mejores circunstancias».
languages.original_text: {n}The governor's expression changes drastically when he sees Cassia.{/n} "Lady Navigator? What an honour! I never thought that House Orsellio would grace our world with a visit. I only wish I could have received you under different circumstances."

traits.locale_text: {n}La expresión del gobernante cambia drásticamente cuando ve a Cassia.{/n} «¿Lady Navegante? ¡Qué honor! Nunca pensé que la casa Orsellio visitaría nuestro mundo. Ojalá pudiera recibirla en mejores circunstancias».

languages.text: {n}Cassia'yı gördüğünde valinin yüz ifadesi bir anda çark ediyor.{/n} "Leydi Rotacı? Bu ne büyük şeref! Orsellio Hanesi'nin dünyamıza teşrif etmesini beklemiyorduk doğrusu. Keşke sizi farklı koşullar altında misafir edebilseydik."
languages.original_text: {n}The governor's expression changes drastically when he sees Cassia.{/n} "Lady Navigator? What an honour! I never thought that House Orsellio would grace our world with a visit. I only wish I could have received you under different circumstances."

traits.locale_text: {n}Cassia'yı gördüğünde valinin yüz ifadesi bir anda çark ediyor.{/n} "Leydi Rotacı? Bu ne büyük şeref! Orsellio Hanesi'nin dünyamıza teşrif etmesini beklemiyorduk doğrusu. Keşke sizi farklı koşullar altında misafir edebilseydik."
